body: What would you do if you were the ruler of the world?
body_tagged: What would you do if you were the ruler of the world?
title: what you would do if you ruled the world

replies.body: I would make you and TheOriginalMad wed each other
replies.body_tagged: I would make you and TheOriginalMad wed each other

replies.body: ?
replies.body_tagged: ?

replies.body:
[Iyaz:]
Ya know it's your boy I-Y-A-Z and big time rush! (woo! [echo])

[Kendall:]
If I ruled the world, I'd throw all the money
In the air like confetti
If I ruled the world, every house got a DJ and a backyard party.
And I'd break all the borders down, when I shake the ground

[James:]
If I ruled the world
I'd dream out loud

[All:]
So everybody get up, up
Out of your seats
Kick off your shoes, like you're down at the beach
Jump up, up, up
On the beat singing "Aye oh! ", "Aye oh! ", "Aye oh! "
Up, up, out of your seats
Be who you are love is all you need
All of us Geeks, freaks and wannabes singing "Aye oh! "

If I ruled the world, I would give it, give it all to you, give it, give it all to you [x2]

[Logan:]
If you were my girl
You'd never have to worry about another thing, no
'Cause I'd rule the world, and you'd be right next to me
Running the show
We'd throw every rule in the book out and
Bring down the house

[James:]
If you were my girl
We'd dream out loud

[All:]
So everybody get up, up
Out of your seats
Kick off your shoes, like you're down at the beach
Jump up, up, up
On the beat singing "Aye oh! ", "Aye oh! ", "Aye oh! "
Up, up, out of your seats
Be who you are love is all you need
All of us geeks, freaks and wannabes singing "Aye oh! "

If I ruled the world, I would give it, give it all to you, give it, give it all to you [x2]

[Iyaz:]
I'd be beating on my chest; I'm the king of the hill.
Iyaz and big time rush keepin' it real.
Magic carpets, girl we go wherever,
I ain't tryin' a run game, I ain't tryin' to be clever
Girl, I'm'ma be the king, and you'll be the queen.
Going a hundred miles an hour,
Girl, we runnin' the streets.
And if the cops ever try and pull us over,
We tell them "Hey, Mr. Officer, we own ya! "

[Logan:]
If I ruled the world

[Carlos:]
Here we go, here we go...

[All:]
So everybody get up, up
Out of your seats
Kick off your shoes, like you're down at the beach
Jump up, up, up
On the beat singing "Aye oh! ", "Aye oh! ", "Aye oh! "
Up, up, out of your seats
Be who you are love is all you need
All of us geeks, freaks and wannabes singing "Aye oh! "

If I ruled the world, I would give it, give it all to you, give it, give it all to you [x5]

I would give it, give it all to you, give it, give it all to you, if I ruled the world.

replies.body:
Well, assuming ruling the world would come with money, I would invest all but about 2 million dollars into fixing the world, bringing people out of poverty, helping society, supporting things i want to, etc.
I'd also make everything that is human nature or harmless legal, such as same sex marriage, weed legalised, etc.

replies.body:

But not without trying stuff out first (e.g. achieving political, humanitarian, economic and ecologic ambitions, etc.).

replies.body:
I would get rid of the borders of countries in Africa. Before the British made provinces in  Africa, they didn't have any starvation problems. When they didn't have any borders and weren't guarded by soldiers, they were free to roam around and follow their food source. After the arrival, they were stuck in an area where they couldn't leave to follow their food.
 I would also want make each and every single person equal to each other, where no one is better than each other. A place where everybody has the same amount of wealth. Where everyone has a second chance, like how we deserve a second chance. 
I could go on and on, but this is the basics that I want to do, and basically, I just want to create a better enviornment.

I could go on and on, but this is the basics that I want to do, and basically, I just want to create a better enviornment.
